  • Constructor Details

    • Point

      public Point​(java.lang.String name, int xPosition, int yPosition) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a new delivery point from the given name and coordinates.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the location
      xPosition - latitudinal offset from origin in feet
      yPosition - longitudinal offset from origin in feet
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null

      Method for editing the coordinates of a point
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • getCoordinates

      public java.lang.String getCoordinates()
      Necessary for creating the column of coordinates in map settings (even though it doesn't say that it is used)
      Returns:
      the x,y coordinates formatted as a string

    • distanceFromPoint

      public double distanceFromPoint​(Point other)
      Calculates the distance in feet between this point and another point. If other is null, then the distance from the origin will be used.
      Parameters:
      other - the other point or null
